name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Respondent, v. Cheryl CORRELL, Petitioner
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth, Department of Transportation, Bureau of Driver Licensing v. Correll

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Respondent, v. Cheryl CORRELL, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 23rd day of March, 2001, the Petition for Alowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, the Opinion and Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED. See Commonwealth, Department of Transportation v. McCafferty, 663 Pa. 146, 758 A.2d 1156 (2000).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: David M. McGlaughlin, Philadelphia, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Respondent, v. Cheryl CORRELL, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 23, 2001.
David M. McGlaughlin, Philadelphia, for petitioner.
